Name: Disc Golf: Game On
About the game: The fun of disc golf, coming to PC and console. Featuring six different throw types, ten unique courses and tons of new plastic! EARLY ACCESS INCLUDES: OVER 40 DISCS ON LAUNCH Throw what you want with over 100 discs to choose from. Each disc has their own unique flight and distance. MULTIPLE THROW GRIPS AND STANCES Choose to throw backhand, forehand or tomahawk with three different throw stances, including Standard, Flick, and Putt. RICH ENVIRONMENT AND WILDLIFE Surround yourself with lush foliage and active wildlife, DGGO complements a great round with a captivating nature experience. THE FULL GAME WILL INCLUDE: OVER 100 DISCS AT LAUNCH Throw what you want with over 100 discs to choose from. Each disc has their own unique flight and distance. MULTIPLE THROW GRIPS AND STANCES Choose to throw a backhand, forehand, tomahawk, thumber, or grenade with three different throw stances, including Standard, Flick, and Putt. THROW INSTANT REPLAYS Rewind, replay, and save some of your best shots each round. Share them later with friends or other players in-game. MINI GAMES AND SKILL CHALLENGES Take advantage of addictive mini-games and skill challenges that can help take your approach game to the next level. RICH ENVIRONMENT AND WILDLIFE Surround yourself with lush foliage and active wildlife, DGGO complements a great round with a captivating nature experience. FIELD WORK ON STEROIDS Ready to see what that new driver can do? Use this in-depth game mode to try different discs (and throws) before hitting the course.
